She hired a then-unknown piano player for that engagement; a young man fresh from New Orleans named Harry Connick, Ray Charles , who later introduced her at a David Letterman Christmas party as one of the world's finest jazz singers. That four-week engagement lasted for three years for Cynthia Scott , and she decided to stay in New York. Since then, she has headlined at Birdland, Iridium, Dizzy's Club Coca Cola and many more.
